title: Save Vanra
content:
Save Vanra Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Blushing Mermaid Reward Duelist's Prerogative Amulet of Windrider

Duelist's Prerogative

Amulet of Windrider

Save Vanra is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Save Vanra can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Save Vanra Objectives

Investigate the Blushing Mermaid At Basilisk gate, we met a distraught Lor
